Posts.Content: Feb 14, 2009 08:36AM heatherlr wrote: My Radiation Oncologist prescribed Biafine Emulsion, which seems to be really comfortableto use - 3 times a day and then Eucerin Aquafor at bed time (with an old t-shirt because it's greasy). Also, washing with Cetaphil helps moisturize.
Posts.Title: no creams and lotion allowed during Radiations See Roya
